item.description:

Main Event: Tyson Fury (32-0-1) vs. Dereck Chisora (33-12-0) Co-Main Event: Daniel Dubois (18-1-0) vs. Kevin Lerena (28-1-0) Main Card: Yvan Mendy (47-5-1) vs. Denis Berinchyk (16-0-0) Prelim: Karol Itauma (8-0-0) vs. Vladimir Belujsky (12-5-1) Prelim: Isaac Lowe (21-2-3) vs. Sandeep Singh Bhatti (8-4-0) Prelim: Royston Barney Smith (0-0-0) vs. Cruz Perez (3-3-0)
